name: Eduhub-KMR
description: Eduhub-KMR is a Telegram study bot designed to assist students with educational resources, study tips, and interactive learning tools for effective preparation, especially for competitive exams like NEET.
author: itzfew (t.me/itzfew)

scripts.dev: DEBUG=bot* dotenv -- nodemon -e ts -x ts-node src/index.ts
